overview: San Francisco is the stage for 3 Easy Pieces, with the City by the Bay's majestic, rugged scenery as the backdrop for 3 episodes of non-stop, sexy action between 3 different trios of hot TITAN men.;In the first scene, hunky hardhat Michael Vincenzo climbs aboard his handsome construction foreman Peter Wilder. But after getting back to the tool shop, he has to make room for the stunning, chiseled Van Darkholm to join in the ride.;When two apartment hunters, Paul Morgan and Tim MacKenzie, celebrate a find with some romantic smooching and groping, they arouse sexy painter Dean Maxwell, and the trio fuck their way through every room in the place.;For a nasty weekend, brawny Austin Masters and chiseled Ric Hunter fly in a fuck buddy -- dark beauty Brice Patton. They've hardly said hello before they're into each other's hairy, hard bodies. The studs engage in incredible acrobatics as they suck and fuck each other with abandon. It's hot man-sex, San Francisco style.
title: 3 Easy Pieces
